comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Looked him up on Google and he was a gentleman of the Jewish faith who emigrated from England to Australia and set up in business there.  He was very successful and at some point joined the Free Masons where he rose through the ranks and had a distinguished career.  I thought the name was a misspelling of the title baron but his name was Barron!

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: That's so interesting. We'll make some adjustments to our catalogue record to reflect this added information. Thanks so much!
